import React from 'react'; import { Link } from 'react-router-dom'; import { FaLeaf, FaTruck, FaHeart, FaUsers } from 'react-icons/fa'; const About = () => { return (
{/* Hero Section */}

Our Story

Bringing beauty and joy to your life through carefully crafted flower arrangements since 2020.

{/* Story Section */}

How It All Started

FloraCart was born from a simple idea: to make beautiful flower arrangements accessible to everyone. Our founder, Sarah Johnson, started arranging flowers as a hobby, creating unique bouquets for friends and family. The overwhelming positive response led to the creation of FloraCart.

What began as a small home-based business has grown into a trusted name in flower delivery, serving customers across the country. We maintain our commitment to quality, creativity, and personal touch in every arrangement we create.

Today, FloraCart is more than just a flower shop - it's a community of flower enthusiasts, creative designers, and satisfied customers who share our passion for bringing beauty into people's lives.

2020

Founded

{/* Values Section */}

Our Values

Quality

We source only the freshest and highest quality flowers for our arrangements.

Reliability

Count on us for timely delivery and consistent quality in every order.

Passion

Our love for flowers drives us to create unique and beautiful arrangements.

Community

We believe in building lasting relationships with our customers and partners.

{/* Team Section */}

Meet Our Team

Sarah Johnson

Founder & Creative Director

With over 15 years of experience in floral design, Sarah brings creativity and passion to every arrangement.

Michael Chen

Head of Operations

Michael ensures smooth operations and maintains our high standards of quality and service.

Emily Rodriguez

Lead Designer

Emily's artistic vision and attention to detail create stunning arrangements that delight our customers.

{/* CTA Section */}

Join Our Flower Community

Experience the beauty and joy of our handcrafted flower arrangements. Order today and let us bring a touch of nature to your doorstep.

Shop Now
); }; export default About;
